Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience. Given its value and quality, we believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, I'm offering it at a special introductory price of $95. This is an opportunity to get a high-quality item at a reasonable cost. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
